description:
Dr. Ver`s plans to murder most of humanity and make himself king have failed, so he sets the Nephilim`s reactor to explode.  With only minutes before it blows up into a trillion degree heat, the Symphogear Wielderss must use all their power to stop it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Harukakanata, Hoshi ga Ongaku to Natta... Kano Hi
In the Distance, That Day... When the Star Became Music
遥か彼方, 星が音楽となった... かの日
